frame.name: Irregular_combatants
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Combatant</fen> is declared or loyal to a Side in a military Conflict. The <fen>Combatant</fen> is not part of any regular or (highly) organized fighting organization (such as an army), and is not necessarily a fighter by vocation.
<ex>A <fex name="Age">20-year=old</fex> <fex name="Origin">Argentinian</fex> <fex name="Combatant"><t>guerilla</t></fex> was firing at our squad.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Origin
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Origin</fen> is the place where the <fen>Combatant</fen> was born or lived a salient part of her or his life.</def-root>

FE.name: Combatant
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Combatant</fen> is the human being involved in combat.</def-root>

FE.name: Persistent_characteristic
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen> is a physiological characteristic or personality trait of the <fen>Combatant</fen> which is concieved of as persisting over time.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Descriptor</fen> is a temporary condition of the <fen>Combatant</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Age
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Age</fen> is the length of time the <fen>Person</fen> has been alive.</def-root>

FE.name: Ethnicity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Ethnicity</fen> is the religious, racial, national, socio-economic or cultural group to which the <fen>Combatant</fen> belongs.</def-root>

FE.name: Context_of_acquaintance
FE.definition: <def-root>An expression indicating the context with which the <fen>Combatant</fen> is associated. </def-root>

FE.name: Side_1
FE.definition: <def-root>The side of the conflict for which the <fen>Combatant</fen> fights.</def-root>

FE.name: Side_2
FE.definition: <def-root>A (or the) side of the conflict to which the <fen>Combatant</fen> is opposed.</def-root>

FE.name: Conflict
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Conflict</fen> in which the <fen>Combatant</fen>s are fighting. <ex>Some call him a <fex name="conf">holy war</fex> fighter and martyr.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>The desired result of the outcome of the hostile encounter for <fen>Side_1</fen>. It may either directly refer to the state of affairs that is desired, or the state of affairs may be implicit in an (abstract or concrete) entity that they desire.
<ex>We are not just soldiers - we are <t>fighters</t> <fex name="pur">for a cause</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Group
FE.definition:
<def-root>The larger military group of which the <fen>Combatant</fen> is a part.
<ex>A number of <fex name="gro">militia</fex> <t>fighters</t> were arrested during the raid.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: oorlog.n
lexUnit.definition: tussen twee of meer landen of volkeren

lexUnit.name: partizaan.n
lexUnit.definition: die deel uitmaakt van ongeregelde troepen

lexUnit.name: guerrilla.n
lexUnit.definition: die een guerrilla voert, of de organisatie daarvan
